name: hv_vcpu_exit_t
desc: Information about an exit from the vCPU to the host.

items.name: var exception: hv_vcpu_exit_exception_t
items.desc: Information about an exit exception from the vcpu to the host.

items.name: var reason: hv_exit_reason_t
items.desc: Information about an exit from the vcpu to the host.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a new exit reason structure.

items.name: init(reason: hv_exit_reason_t, exception: hv_vcpu_exit_exception_t)
items.desc: Creates a new virtual cpu exit structure with a reason and exception that you provide.
